'''Tilly''' is [[Eddie Menuek|Eddie Menuek's]] ex-girlfriend, portrayed by [[Mary Gallagher]].

Tilly left Eddie when she could not cope with his irrational, crazy behavior. In "[[The One Where Dr. Ramoray Dies]]", she comes to the apartment to bring back a fish tank to Eddie (without a goldfish which Eddie then believes [[Chandler Bing]] killed). After she leaves, Eddie immediately accuses Chandler of sleeping with her.
